Title: ...And the Woman Clothed with the Sun
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Jeff Vlaming, Helen Shang, Bryan Fuller, Steve Lightfoot
Actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Hugh Dancy, Caroline Dhavernas, Gillian Anderson
Plot: The search for serial killer Francis Dolarhyde heats up as Will delves into dangerous territory. He envisions himself in Dolarhyde's psyche and contacts Hannibal Lecter for help in profiling the killer.
